name: Unleash
description: Unleash is a Tower Wars game, set in a dystopian future, where gifted children known as Dreamers are exploited by ruthless fighters to unleash hordes of monsters into arenas filled with massive guns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 or better with 512MB VRAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum resolution: 1366x768
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: Recommended resolution: HD (1920x1080) or more
